content:
News Editor

The Howard Baker Jr PERIOD Center is located on  Cumberland Avenue PERIOD

Avoid being discounted reads a sign inside the Howard H PERIOD Baker Jr Center for Public Policy where from Oct PERIOD  to Nov PERIOD  voters registered in Knox County can cast their bid for the next U.S PERIOD President PERIOD

Early voting is taking place in the Toyota Auditorium of the Baker Center and students with an official ID could start voting as early as Monday PERIOD

On the first day Oct PERIOD  there was an impressive turnout of voters from students faculty and Knoxville residents PERIOD

Nissa DahlinBrown associate director of the Baker Center was one of the people who helped launch and organize early voting at the center PERIOD

Its so important particularly for students because laws that are enacted in the next congress are going to impact young voters a lot more than they are going to impact me in the future DahlinBrown said PERIOD So you need to have your voice heard and make sure they understand. many students expressed similar opinions to DahlinBrowns saying that the Baker Center provides a convenient alternative PERIOD Voters who wait until Nov PERIOD  will likely endure longer lines and they will have to vote at a specific location based on the address they registered with PERIOD

Its important to have your opinion stated PERIOD You cant be mad about whos in office if you dont vote Thomas Patten freshman in exploratory said PERIOD And if the Baker Center didnt have early voting I probably wouldnt have voted because I have no way to get there. the Baker Center is open from  a.m PERIOD to  p.m PERIOD during early voting PERIOD
